column1: I really hope your (techs) do testing of each/every resident residing in 'long term care' facilities of Edmonton. Then we know for sure who doesn't have the Corona virus, who does.

Thank you for the updates! Pics are amazing like this one! I hope everyone keeps focus rise up & do PEACEFUL SAFE #GeorgeFloyd protests - stay masked stay distanced from.each other - don't take home the Corona virus infection your young & older people because of a protest.
